featured.text: He was worried that the audience would fall asleep since most of the 75-minute performance was a cappella, that is, singing without instrumental sound.

definition.zh_def: 無伴奏合唱，通常由小型合唱團演唱的音樂形式。
definition.en_def: A style of singing without instrumental accompaniment, typically performed by a small choir.
definition.example: The choir performed a beautiful cappella piece at the concert.
